data.name: December 24th
data.detailed_description:
From the creators of Gazmatera: Return of the Generals!
December 24th is a fast-paced classic FPS, inspired by the Quake 2 and Team Fortress.
Collect crates to earn bonuses, destroy your enemies with 9 types of weapons and play with your friends with support up to 18 players on one map!
data.about_the_game:
From the creators of Gazmatera: Return of the Generals!

data.short_description: From the creators of Gazmatera: Return of the Generals! December 24th is a fast-paced classic FPS, inspired by the Quake 2 and Team Fortress. Collect crates to earn bonuses, destroy your enemies with 9 types of weapons and play with your friends with support up to 18 players on one map!
data.supported_languages:
Russian*, English
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“You don't regret playing this game.”
9.4/10 – Watermelon Informer

“Better than BF2042 (it's only BF's failure, lol).”
7.8/10 – Espiogonglgemongoloid

“Remember Kalifas? And where they was year ago? Skyrocketing progress, we gonna say.”
4,7/5 – Dolphin Magazine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Pentium N4200 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 500/NVidia GeForce GTS 450/AMD Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card
  • Additional Notes: As people tell us, sometimes game can work on DX10 cards, we don't know on which and why.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 730/NVidia GeForce GTX 750/AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic sound card
  • Additional Notes: Not guaranteed to work on Windows 7!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Pentium N4200 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 500/NVidia GeForce GTS 450/AMD Radeon HD 6770
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card
  • Additional Notes: Use command "sudo su echo "5000" > /sys/class/drm/card0/engine/rcs0/preempt_timeout_ms" if game is closing after launch.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 730/NVidia GeForce GTX 750/AMD Radeon R7 370
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic sound card
  • Additional Notes: Doesn't work on Raspbian!
